description: This file implements the advanced interface functions for the Slap Loam Broker Object, including dispatching incoming calls, freeing output buffers, and handling events related to the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It handles IMCP_SLAP_CALL messages and manages LPC connection events.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboCpcCallDispatch(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLpcPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,void ** ppOutputBuffer,PULONG pulOutputSize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Dispatches an IMCP-based SLAP call received via LPC, determining call type and processing accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboCpcFreeOutputBuffer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * pOutputBuffer)
methods.description: Releases the output buffer allocated for a response to a SLAP call.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLboCpcNotifyEvent(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulEvent,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles LPC connection events such as disconnection and performs cleanup.

ctags.name: SlapLboCpcCallDispatch
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hLpcPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,void ** ppOutputBuffer,PULONG pulOutputSize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
